thread.section_title: Hotel de Varenne - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent stay
thread.title_full: Excellent stay - Review of Hotel de Varenne, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: miketelles1
title: Excellent stay
text:
We had a wonderful experience last week during our 4 nights stay.
Our cosy room was located on the gerden side and we had absolutely no noise at all.
The decoration and confort were second to none, this was a perfect choice for us.
As already mentioned the entire staff has been lovely and efficcient.
One more thing : the location is the best !
